description:
Bomberman Quest is a top-down action RPG developed by Hudson
Plays something like a simpler version of the Zelda games where Bomberman will collect various tools to help him explore the world and defeat escaped mosnters.

bombquest_v0.0.1.description:
Still a very early release, there may still be logic errors or other bugs, please report them if you come across any. This release page may be silently updated so please check here for updates.
## Updates
9/26/2025
- fixed a problem with pyro commanders check not sending
- possible fix with the same thing for chaos bomber

9/18/2025
- Added Color randomization
- Fixed Engine Goal

## Setup
### Installation
Same as most other unsupported Gameboy Color apworld,

simply move bomberman_quest.apworld into the custom_worlds directory in your Archipelago install server
(default path: C:\ProgramData\Archipelago\custom_worlds) 
or simply double click the apworld and it should install itself (Archipelago version 0.5.0 and later)

### Running
In the Archipelago launcher push the 'Generate Template Options' button to generate a yaml for your options
Like every other apworld, fill out your yaml options and have the host generate the multiworld, the produced zip file should contain a .apbombquest patch file. Receive this .apbombquest patch from the multiworld host.
Push the 'Open Patch' button in the launcher and it should ask for a 'Pokemon Pinball (US)' legal ROM dump (MD5 Hash: `ad358f284c3303db01212016ed3944d5`), then select the generated .apbombquest patch file to produce a .gbc ROM which should auto launch in a bizhawk instance. You should be set otherwise from here just follow the same instructions as any other supported GBC apworld.


## Locations
- Monster Drops
- Boss Item Drops
- Bomber Statue Items
- Underground Shovel Items
- Chests
- Bomb Synthesis Results

## Items
- Gear
- Equipment
- Bomb Components
- Consumables

## Goals
- 4 Engines (Defeat 4 commanders and collect their engines)
- Chaos Bomber (Defeat all 4 commanders, 48 monsters then defeat Chaos Bomber)
- Trading Cards (Collect the White, Black and Honey Card and trade them in)

## Extra Features
- Explosive core is now permanent and doesn't get consumed upon use but there is now only 1 in the item pool

## Options
- Starting with a fire or sneakers
- Healing at the save point in Peece Town
- Opening up all 4 regions from the start
- Deathlink
- Starting Health

## Thanks
Big thanks to @Baltickey for their work on logic spreadsheets, ideas
bombquest_v0.0.1.title: Bomberman Quest AP v0.0.1

bombquest_v0.1.0.description:
## Updates
- Fixed Peece Card Trade location
- Changes for Archipelago 0.6.4 compatability

## Setup
### Installation
